overview: Everyone knows that cowboys are the hardiest – not to mention hardest! – of characters; and it’s little wonder that gay guys everywhere have always had a bit of a soft spot for them. Or should that be a hard spot? No fucking wonder a cowboy was an integral character of Village People! Not that there’s much in the way of singing and dancing here. What isn’t lacking, however, is a very hearty share of cock-sucking and ass-fucking; led by boys who are only too happy to ride it raw and wild for a spunk-laden yee-haaa!
title: Raw Rodeo
